briefTitle: Study of the Outcomes of Intraoperative Margin Assessment With MarginProbe
officialTitle: A Phase II Study of the Outcomes of Intraoperative Margin Assessment With Adjunctive Use of MarginProbe in Addition to Standard
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of patients with histologically positive surgical margins
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Subjects able to read and understand the informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Subjects unable to read or understand the informed consent.
